layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 151x70 [border: (3px solid #008000)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (3,3) size 145x64
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 145x60
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 141x60 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutTable {TABLE} at (1,1) size 139x58 [border: (3px solid #008000)]
                LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 75.50x26 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
                  LayoutText {#text} at (26,3) size 23x19
                    text run at (26,3) width 23: "cap"
                LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (3,29) size 133x26
                  LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 133x22
                    LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 129x22 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                      LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 127x19
                        text run at (1,1) width 127: "table cell foo and bar"
